pr_title: feat: new sample - Tables: Add empty column

timeline.message: feat: new sample - Tables: Add empty column

timeline.author: kurtisvg

timeline.bodyText:
nit: Consider using forEach:
List<Field> fieldList = new ArrayList<Field>()
fields.forEach(fieldList::add)
timeline.author: kurtisvg

replies.bodyText: You're right! A great place to use lambda exp!
replies.author: stephaniewang526

timeline.bodyText: Do we expect users to want to generate a column name with a UUID? Perhaps this would be better as a provided argument, and we can uses a UUID from the tests side instead.
timeline.author: kurtisvg
